comment: /**  * Returns the preferred discovery node for this request. The remote cluster client will attempt to send  * this request directly to this node. Otherwise, it will send the request as a proxy action that will  * be routed by the remote cluster to this node.  *  * @return preferred discovery node  */
code: /**  * Returns the preferred discovery node for this request. The remote cluster client will attempt to send  * this request directly to this node. Otherwise, it will send the request as a proxy action that will  * be routed by the remote cluster to this node.  *  * @return preferred discovery node  */ DiscoveryNode getPreferredTargetNode().
